snippet.title: Dark Light: Survivor trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now on Steam!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3088070/Dark_Light_Survivor/?beta=0


#gaming #DarklightSurvivor #IndieGame #RogueLike #ActionRougelike #PCGaming #IndieDev #NewGame #Cyberpunk #toptown #atmospheric #SurvivalGame #thirdpersonshooter #PostApocalypticgaming

We are thrilled to announce that our new game, Dark Light: Survivor, is now available for wishlisting on Steam!

Wishlist Now on Steam!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3088070/Dark_Light_Survivor/?beta=0

Dark Light: Survivor is an exciting extension of the “Dark Light” universe. In a dying multiverse, the Phantom Train is your last hope. Traverse a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world filled with nightmarish creatures in this Rogue-like survival adventure.

Game Overview: In Dark Light: Survivor, you play as one of the last humans, journeying through a shattered multiverse in search of the fabled Elysium. The Dark Void has unleashed horrific creatures that decimated humanity and fractured the multiverse. Amidst this chaos, a legend speaks of an Elysium untouched by the darkness.

Humanity's remnants have uncovered celestial quantum technology, constructing the Phantom Train capable of traversing the multiverse. As a Dark Hunter aboard the Phantom Train, you must collect energy in each universe to power the train for the next leap. Prepare yourself to face increasingly terrifying and powerful creatures, for the journey is perilous, and Elysium remains elusive.

Key Features:
• Dynamic Perspective Shifts: Seamlessly switch between top-down and close-up third-person views for tactical and immersive gameplay.

• Cinematic Graphics with Retro Style: Experience stunning cinematic graphics with the option to switch to nostalgic pixel mode.

• Deep Customization: Collect armor and gear, and upgrade your weapons to adapt to the relentless challenges of the multiverse.

To support us, please wishlist the game now and spread the news to help us grow.
